survey_name: Car Sharing Service User Experience Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate user satisfaction and identify areas for improvement in a car sharing service, focusing on ease of use, vehicle availability, and overall experience.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use our car sharing service?
questions.client_notes: This helps segment users by engagement level. Consider adding a follow-up for infrequent users to understand barriers.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice radio buttons. Include 'Prefer not to say' if required.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use our car sharing service?

questions.question_text: What is your primary reason for using our car sharing service?
questions.client_notes: Include an open-ended option for 'Other' to capture unique motivations.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What is your primary reason for using our car sharing service?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the ease of booking a vehicle through our app?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Consider benchmarking against competitors.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the ease of booking a vehicle through our app?

questions.question_text: How would you rate the availability of vehicles in your preferred locations?
questions.client_notes: This is a key performance indicator. Consider geographic segmentation for deeper analysis.

script.question_text: How would you rate the availability of vehicles in your preferred locations?

questions.question_text: What types of vehicles do you typically book? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to understand vehicle preferences. Use this data for fleet optimization.
questions.scripter_notes: Multi-choice checkboxes with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What types of vehicles do you typically book? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the cleanliness and maintenance of the vehicles?
questions.client_notes: This impacts user retention. Consider adding a follow-up for dissatisfied users.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the cleanliness and maintenance of the vehicles?

questions.question_text: Have you ever experienced any technical issues with our app?
questions.client_notes: If 'Yes,' route to Q8 for details. This helps prioritize bug fixes.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice radio buttons with conditional routing.

script.question_text: Have you ever experienced any technical issues with our app?

questions.question_text: Please describe the technical issues you encountered with our app.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture specific pain points. Use for QA improvements.
questions.scripter_notes: Open-text field. Optional character limit (e.g., 500 chars).

script.question_text: Please describe the technical issues you encountered with our app.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with our customer support team?
questions.client_notes: Critical for service quality. Follow up with low scores to understand gaps.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with our customer support team?

questions.question_text: What additional features or services would you like to see in our car sharing service?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture innovation ideas. Use for product roadmap.
questions.scripter_notes: Open-text field. Optional character limit (e.g., 500 chars).

script.question_text: What additional features or services would you like to see in our car sharing service?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend our car sharing service to others?
questions.client_notes: Net Promoter Score (NPS) question. Calculate by subtracting detractors from promoters.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend our car sharing service to others?

questions.client_notes: Demographic data for segmentation. Ensure compliance with privacy regulations.
